resourceGroupInformation.name: Energy
Energie
resourceGroupInformation.description: Zeichnet alle Batterie-Events des Geräts auf und stellt sie zur Verfügung
Records all battery events of the device and provides them

privacySetting.name: Level
privacySetting.changeDescription: Change it to true, to get the level

privacySetting.name: Health
privacySetting.changeDescription: Change it to true, to get the health

privacySetting.name: Status
privacySetting.changeDescription: Change it to true, to get the status

privacySetting.name: Plugged
privacySetting.changeDescription: Change it to true, to get the plugged

privacySetting.name: Status time
privacySetting.description: Get the time of the same status
privacySetting.changeDescription: Change it to true, to get the time of the same status

privacySetting.name: Temperature
privacySetting.changeDescription: Change it to current to get the current temperature, change it to all to get the average and peak temerpature

privacySetting.name: Charging ratio
privacySetting.changeDescription: Change it to true, to get the charging ratio

privacySetting.name: Charging count
privacySetting.changeDescription: Change it to true, to get the charging count

privacySetting.name: Device uptime with battery
privacySetting.description: Get the device uptime with battery
privacySetting.changeDescription: Change it to total_time or all, to get the device uptime with battery

privacySetting.name: Device dates
privacySetting.description: Get the device dates of last boot
privacySetting.changeDescription: Change it to true, to get the date of the last boot

privacySetting.name: Device Screen Time
privacySetting.description: Get the time of the device with screen on
privacySetting.changeDescription: Change it to true, to get the time of screen on

privacySetting.name: Upload data
privacySetting.description: Upload all enery events to a webserver and calculate statistics
privacySetting.changeDescription: Change to true to get the posibility to upload the collected data

privacySetting.name: Device dates total
privacySetting.description: Get the device dates of first measurement
privacySetting.changeDescription: Change it to true to get also the date of first measurement
